arguments.name: Cost
arguments.description: The initial cost of the asset.

arguments.name: Salvage
arguments.description: The value at the end of the depreciation (sometimes called the salvage value of the asset).

arguments.name: Life
arguments.description: The number of periods over which the asset is being depreciated (sometimes called the useful life of the asset).

arguments.name: Period
arguments.description: The period for which you want to calculate the depreciation. Period must use the same units as life.

arguments.name: Month
arguments.description: The number of months in the first year. If month is omitted, it is assumed to be 12.
